ygData.subject: Re: [neat] Discussion: Closing the Archives
ygData.msgSnippet: Hi All, As the one who suggested to open up the archives in the first place - off list if I remember rightly, a bit sly that eh :) -  I vote to keep them open.

Subject: Re: [neat] Discussion: Closing the Archives
X-Yahoo-Group-Post: member; u=127853030; y=U5xhtuNaCihxzpCzLVmcIUI519-0TNzjWfjmpdmbFNaEG5-RlC-_

Hi All,

As the one who suggested to open up the archives in the first place - 
off list if I remember rightly, a bit sly that eh :) -  I vote to keep 
them open. I suggested this to allow the archives to be searched via the 
likes of google, e.g. someone out there could be thinking about some of 
the same stuff as us - but they won't find our discussions via google if 
the archive is closed. So hopefully opening up the archive will attract 
some people it might not have done otherwise. As others have said, I 
suspect the drop-off in posting frequency and new members is a seasonal 
thing + maybe a bit of a statistical abberation.

http://groups.yahoo.com/group/neat/

Colin.
